data.title: [Esther Rolle "Ain't I A Woman " interview]
meta_keywords: Black Academy of Arts and Letters (Dallas
The Black Academy of Arts and Letters
Social Life and Customs - Clubs and Organizations
data.meta_description: Video recording from The Black Academy of Arts and Letters recorded during an interview with actress Esther Rolle in relation to the one-woman show "Ain't I A Woman" held in March of 1982 with JBAAL. The U-Matic footage features an interview with Rolle where she is seated and discusses topics such as theatre and politics and gender.
data.text:
Program for the performance of Ain't I A Woman, which was performed on March 21, 1982 by Esther Rolle. The program provides a brief description of the performance as well as information on the various producers of the play.
